name: Blast Billiards
description:
Blast billiards is a chaotic billiards game where you pocket the balls using bombs.

Launch bombs onto the table to push the balls and pocket them. Experience with different launch angles and pocket the balls fast to get a higher score.

This is my would be submition to the GMTK 2020's Game Jam and it was made whitin 48h or so. The jam's theme was "Out of control". I appreciate any feedback; hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

Click and drag to create and launch the bombs. 

Press Alt+Esc to Close the game.

Thanks for these creators for publishing free art and sound:

game assets 66 (https://opengameart.org/users/gameassets66) - billiards sprite set
richtaur (http://www.lostdecadegames.com/) - bomb on the logo
Amon (https://opengameart.org/users/amon)- bomb animation
Emma_MA (https://opengameart.org/users/emmama) -backgorund music
